asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText: https://www.cuisinart.com/products/kitchen_tools___gadgets.html These are three of Cuisinart's Kitchen Tools and Gadgets - the Food Scraper, 12" Tongs, and Meat Thermometer. The food scraper has a soft handle and the stainless steel blade has measurement marking for portioning out dough. The tongs come with a safety lock for easy storage.  Cuisinart's meat thermometer goes up to 450 degrees. Have a look at the whole category.
